meta.title: Security | Folio Wallet
meta.description: Learn how Folio protects your documents with end-to-end encryption, zero-knowledge architecture, and industry-leading security standards.
meta.ogDescription: Your data stays yours. Folio uses end-to-end encryption and zero-knowledge architecture to keep your documents private and secure.

hero.title: Your data stays yours
hero.description: Folio is built on the principle that your personal documents belong to you alone. We use end-to-end encryption and zero-knowledge architecture to ensure that only you can access your data. Not even Folio can read your documents.

keyFeatures.title: How we protect your data
keyFeatures.description: Every layer of Folio is designed with security and privacy at its core.

e2e.title: End-to-end encryption
e2e.description: Your documents are encrypted before they leave your device. Only you hold the keys to decrypt them.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-knowledge architecture
zeroKnowledge.description: We never see your data. Our servers store only encrypted information that we cannot read or access.

localFirst.title: Local-first storage
localFirst.description: Your documents live on your device first. They're always available, even without internet.

secureSync.title: Secure cloud sync
secureSync.description: When you sync across devices, your data travels encrypted. We facilitate the transfer but cannot view the contents.

encryption.title: Encryption you can trust
encryption.description: Every document, card, and piece of personal information you store in Folio is encrypted using modern cryptographic standards. Your encryption keys are derived from credentials only you know. This means your data remains private even if our servers were ever compromised.

noAccess.title: We cannot access your data
noAccess.description: Folio operates on a zero-knowledge model. We store only encrypted blobs and cryptographic hashes on our servers. Without your personal keys, this data is meaningless. We cannot decrypt it, read it, or share it with anyone. Your privacy is not a policy choice, it is a technical guarantee.

yourDevice.title: Your device, your data
yourDevice.description: Folio stores your documents locally on your device first. This means you always have access to your important information, whether you're online or offline. Cloud sync is optional and always encrypted. You stay in control of where your data lives.

biometric.title: Biometric protection
biometric.description: Add an extra layer of security with Face ID or fingerprint authentication. Even if someone has your phone, they cannot access your Folio without your biometric confirmation.

compliance.title: Compliance and certifications
compliance.description: We maintain rigorous security standards and comply with international data protection regulations.

iso27001.title: ISO 27001
iso27001.description: Certified information security management ensuring systematic protection of sensitive data.

soc2.title: SOC 2 Type II
soc2.description: Independent verification of our security controls, availability, and confidentiality practices.

gdpr.title: GDPR compliant
gdpr.description: Full compliance with European data protection regulations, giving you control over your personal data.

recoveryCode.title: Your recovery code matters
recoveryCode.description: During setup, Folio generates a unique Recovery Code. This code is the only way to restore your account if you lose access to your devices. Because of our zero-knowledge design, we cannot help you recover your data without it. Store your Recovery Code somewhere safe, like a password manager or a secure physical location.

cta.description: Download Folio and experience document storage that puts your privacy first.

meta.title: About | Folio
meta.description: Folio is a digital identity company building secure document storage for individuals, verification solutions for businesses, and digital credentials for governments.
meta.ogDescription: Folio is a digital identity company building secure document storage for individuals, verification solutions for businesses, and digital credentials for governments.

hero.title: About Folio
hero.description: Folio is a digital identity company on a mission to give people control over their personal documents and identity. We build secure solutions that work for individuals, businesses, and governments.

story.title: Our story
paragraphs: Founded in London, Folio started with a simple observation: people carry dozens of important documents but have no secure, organized way to access them digitally. Passports get lost, tickets expire in email threads, and important cards sit forgotten in drawers.

We built Folio Wallet to solve this. An app where you can store passports, IDs, tickets, cards, and any document you need, all encrypted with keys only you control. Over a million documents are now safely stored in Folio, used by people in more than 120 countries.

As we grew, businesses and governments approached us with similar challenges. How do you verify someone's identity online? How do you issue secure digital credentials? How do you protect sensitive data while making verification seamless?

Today, Folio offers a complete identity platform: secure storage for individuals, verification tools for businesses, and digital credential infrastructure for governments. Our work with Albania's election commission, where we helped register over 365,000 diaspora voters, shows what's possible when identity technology is built right.

meta.title: Age Verification | Folio Wallet
meta.description: Age verification service for global compliance. Confirm user age quickly and securely with verification methods that match your risk level.

hero.title: Age verification service for global compliance
hero.description: Folio helps you confirm user age quickly and securely anywhere in the world. You choose verification methods that match your risk level, from private anonymous checks to full identity verification, while staying aligned with global standards including GDPR, COPPA, DSA and others.

frictionless.title: Age checks without friction
frictionless.description: Age verification with Folio is fast, intuitive and smooth. Users complete a selfie, age credential or a document scan in a few seconds, keeping onboarding simple and minimising drop offs.

document.title: Document based verification
document.description: When you need maximum assurance, users upload an ID document for full age verification. Folio validates authenticity, runs liveness checks and confirms legal age so you can meet strict regulatory requirements.

face.title: Face based age estimation
face.description: Users take a quick selfie and our AI estimates age in seconds. No documents are required. Built in liveness checks help prevent fraud while keeping the flow light and mobile friendly.

anonymous.title: Anonymous age credential
anonymous.description: A one time verified age credential that can be reused without revealing identity. Users prove they are old enough with a privacy preserving token instead of personal data.

privacy.title: Privacy that stays with the user
privacy.description: Folio is designed around privacy from the first step. Anonymous and minimal data flows reduce what you need to store and process. Where biometrics are used, they stay protected and handled securely so you stay aligned with global privacy laws.

assurance.title: All essential age assurance features
assurance.description: Folio brings liveness checks, biometric precision, real time estimation and document backed verification into one platform. You can choose the right level of assurance for your users and your product without adding unnecessary friction.

social.title: Social platforms and messaging
social.description: Protect younger users and support child safety rules by confirming appropriate age before access, with the option to add parental consent where needed.

gaming.title: Online gaming and gambling
gaming.description: Confirm players meet legal age limits before they play. Strong age checks help prevent misuse, support licensing requirements and reduce fraud.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce and delivery
ecommerce.description: Verify age at checkout for alcohol, tobacco and other restricted products. Folio fits into your existing purchase or delivery flow without slowing it down.

fintech.title: Fintech and financial services
fintech.description: Ensure that customers meet minimum age requirements for accounts, wallets and financial products while keeping digital onboarding straightforward.

streaming.title: Streaming and adult content
streaming.description: Make sure age restricted content is shown only to eligible audiences with verification methods that match your viewing experience.

telecom.title: Telecommunications
telecom.description: Check customer age for plans, contracts and services that require legal age confirmation while keeping sign up quick and simple.

sdk.title: Web and mobile SDK
sdk.description: Embed age checks directly into your product. Users complete verification in a native, branded flow that feels like part of your app.

api.title: API
api.description: Control every detail of the age verification journey with our API. Orchestrate methods, rules and outcomes from your own backend systems.

staticUrl.title: Static URL
staticUrl.description: Launch age verification instantly with a secure hosted link. Share it by email, SMS or chat to start checks without any development work.

cta.title: Bring accurate age verification to your product
cta.description: Folio helps you protect users, satisfy regulators and maintain a smooth experience. Talk to our team to design an age assurance flow that fits your product.

items.q: How does the travel timeline work?
items.a: The travel timeline automatically arranges your flights, hotel bookings, train tickets, and events in chronological order. It shows your complete itinerary for each trip, highlights upcoming departures, and keeps a history of past travels. No manual entry required.

items.q: What types of travel documents can I store?
items.a: You can store flight tickets, train tickets, bus passes, hotel confirmations, event tickets, car rental bookings, and any other travel-related documents. Folio works with PDFs, emails, and photos.

items.q: Can I import tickets from email?
items.a: Yes. Simply forward any booking confirmation email to docs@folio.id and Folio will automatically extract the details and add it to your travel timeline.

items.q: Does Folio work offline?
items.a: Yes. All your tickets and travel documents are stored locally on your device and available without internet. Perfect for accessing boarding passes at airports or hotel confirmations in areas with poor signal.

items.q: Can I share my travel plans with family?
items.a: Yes. Create shared folders to safely share travel plans, tickets, or IDs with family and friends. Everyone sees the latest versions automatically and can add their own documents.

items.q: Will Folio work with Apple Wallet passes?
items.a: Yes. You can import .pkpass files from Apple Wallet directly into Folio. Unlike Apple Wallet, Folio extracts and organizes the data, adds it to your travel timeline, and keeps everything searchable.
